Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to requiring the port authority of New York to conduct a study on the alignment of the outerbridge crossing
Summary: Requires the port authority of New York to conduct a study on the alignment of the Outerbridge Crossing in order to determine what steps would need to be taken in order to widen the bridge and increase traffic flow.
LawSection: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
ActClause: AN ACT directing the port authority of New York to study the alignment of the Outerbridge Crossing, in order to widen the bridge and increase the flow of traffic
